title: Workshop on Instructional Design Linking Teacher Personality Traits and Learning Outcomes

context.prior_knowledge: Secondary education curriculum design and foundational pedagogy theory understanding
context.additional_context: A process for in-service secondary teachers to explore instructional design methods that optimize learning outcomes by experiencing teacher roles with diverse personality traits through VR simulations

learning_goals: Learners can analyze and explain three or more impacts of teacher personality traits (based on the Big 5 model) on learning outcomes.
Learners can apply and evaluate two or more education design strategies tailored to personality traits in VR simulation environments.
Learners can develop and apply a teacher competency profiling template that considers learner performance in real educational settings.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
